item.title: LabStore - Part 5 - Building an Object Store in Go: CLI - Command Line Interface
item.description: Learn how to build a CLI for your monorepo, with cobra and the charm stack.

item.title: LabStore - Part 4 - Building an Object Store in Go: IAM - Identity and Access Management
item.description: Building an IAM service on top of SQLite in Go, from config handling to proper secret encryption.
